General.Name: Quadro Acquisition One Corp.
General.Description: Quadro Acquisition One Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to acquire, engage in a share exchange, share reconstruction and amalgamation, contractual control arrangement with, purchase all or substantially various assets of, or engage in any other similar initial business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was formerly known as Kismet Acquisition Two Corp. and changed its name to Quadro Acquisition One Corp. in February 2023. Quadro Acquisition One Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
